title: Deli Gönül
overview: Kadir is a teacher adored by everyone in his coastal town. Everything changes when he falls in love with Fatmanur, a new music teacher at his school. They plan to marry, despite her father's disapproval, but fate – and lies - intervene and cause havoc to both their lives. Kadir moves to Istanbul and starts work at a school with very challenging students. One day his world is rocked when Fatmanur joins the teaching staff. Countless lies have put them on different paths and now they are both married to other people. How will they cope working together? And how will they handle the incredible web of deceit that kept them apart for so long?
